div.p: If you cannot fully access the information on any web page of this site, please let us know the accessibility issue you are having by contacting Kraig Steinhoff, Superintendent at (701) 742-3234, or by e-mail at kraig.steinhoff@k12.nd.us. We will try to provide the information to you in an alternate format and/or make the necessary improvements to make the information accessible. If you would like to file a formal grievance under Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act, you may contact our Section 504 coordinator, Kraig Steinhoff, at 804 Main Ave., Oakes, ND 58474, at (701) 742-3234, or by e-mail at kraig.steinhoff@k12.nd.us. The Oakes Public School District is working on making changes to its website to insure it is accessible to persons with disabilities. We’d like to know how the website is or isn’t accessible to you. If you would be willing to share your thoughts, we would appreciate it. To submit any comments, please contact Maureen Wentworth at 701-742-3234, maureen.wentworth@k12.nd.us.
